subject: CNN Breaking News
body:
-- President Bush commutes the jail sentence of I. Lewis 'Scooter' Libby, former aide to Vice President Dick Cheney, The Associated Press reports.

Watch the latest video now on CNN.com. Access at http://CNN.com. CNN - The most trusted name in news.

interview since being fired from "Grey's Anatomy" after using
an-anti gay slur.  Watch "Larry King Live" tonight at 9 ET.
